blogs.title: My first Blog
blogs.body:
Why do we use it?
It is a long establishe fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'content here, content here
